mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO userNo, USER_ID username, USER_NAME userRealName, USER_PWD userPwd, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ROLE, CREATE_AT createAt FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{username} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( USER_NO, USER_NAME, USER_ID, USER_PWD, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ROLE, CREATE_AT, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userRealName}, #{username}, #{userPwd}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{role}, SYSDATE, 'Y' )
